Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the production of the movie involving Mahendra Dharival, Sunny Deol, and Ameesha Patel?
Options:

B. b) Sunny Deol was part of the initial cast announced in 2011.
C. c) Ameesha Patel was cast alongside Sunny Deol in the movie.
D. d) Mahendra Dharival directed the movie.
Answer: a) Mahendra Dharival had a dispute with Sunny Deol over remuneration. & b) Sunny Deol was part of the initial cast announced in 2011. & c) Ameesha Patel was cast alongside Sunny Deol in the movie.
